attributes.action: direct the Chancellor to reject David Davis' application for position of Crown Steward and Bailiff of the Three Hundreds of Chiltern and spare the British public of the ridiculous charade of a completely unnecessary by-election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
(Former) Shadow Home Secretary David Davis MP has decided to stand down and then run in the subsequent by-election for no very obvious reason.

As the other main parties have already decided not waste party resources fuelling David Davis' ego, the only confirmed opponent so far is a candidate representing the Official Monster Raving Loony Party.

The Chancellor should use his powers to spare the British public (and especially, the people of Haltemprice and Howden who will now also have to endure half a rainforest's worth of election literature piling through their letterboxes) of the expense and hassle of this childish political stunt.
